root.name: ignoreStyles()
root.description: When no parameter is used, this function overrides the SVG's fill and stroke attributes and uses Processing styles and colors to draw the SVG. The function has one optional parameter to enable and disable the original SVG's fill and stroke attributes. If the state parameter is false, it will display the embedded SVG styles and if the state parameter is true, it will ignore the SVG's fill and stroke values.
